Text:
This part is unfortunately recorded in letterbox format, with incorrect aspect ratio. To view it in 4:3 fullscreen, I run mplayer with these options:

mplayer -vf crop=352:160:0:40 -aspect 1:1 Part1.mpg

This is garbage. Don't waste your time downloading this.
Quality is shitty, because this is not a true DVD Rip. This is ripped from old VHS tapes, meaning the quality sucks.
If you don't believe me, just try downloading one of these 8 garbage rips. Shame on those who posted these 8 damned torrents.
